title: Firefox 116 Is Now Available for Download, This Is What’s New
description:
Firefox 116 open-source web browser is now available for download with improved Picture-in-Picture mode, improved Wayland support, and various other changes.

The post Firefox 116 Is Now Available for Download, This Is What’s New appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: MX Linux 23 “Libretto” Is Out with Linux Kernel 6.4, Based on Debian Bookworm
description:
MX Linux 23 distribution is now available for download based on Debian GNU/Linux 12 "Bookworm' and featuring Linux kernel 6.4 on the AHS (Advanced Hardware Support) editions.

The post MX Linux 23 “Libretto” Is Out with Linux Kernel 6.4, Based on Debian Bookworm appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
